isis.stitle: 8 SPEED, 9 SPEED, AND 13 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - REASSEMBLE - AUXILIARY DRIVE GEAR ASSEMBLY

step1.para: If previously removed, install the O-rings on the extended front hub of the front auxiliary drive gear ( Figure 335).

figure.caption: Figure 334. Install O-Rings on Extended Front Hub

step1.para: Install the retainer ring on the auxiliary drive gear, snap ring groove facing the front hub and away from the gear teeth ( Figure 336).

figure.caption: Figure 335. Install Retainer Ring on Auxiliary Drive Gear

step1.para: Start the front auxiliary drive gear bearing on the front hub, bearing snap ring facing the groove in the retainer ring ( Figure 337). Using both the inner and outer race of the bearing as a base, press the bearing on the gear with the snap ring in the groove of the retainer ring or use a bearing driver ( inset, Figure 337).

figure.caption: Figure 336. Start Front Auxiliary Drive Gear Bearing on Front Hub, and Press Bearing on Gear

step1.para: Install the snap ring in the groove of the front gear hub to retain the bearing ( Figure 338).

figure.caption: Figure 337. Install Snap Ring in Groove of Front Gear Hub
